entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 8.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers or periods of drizzle ending this evening then cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight then light before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
